summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5500 for the improvement of 57th Avenue South, from Oscars Street to a point 290 feet, more or less (measured along 57th Avenue South), north of Dawson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 70285, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
